46FFE1D941570C965CDB999F66365C2A: A customizable turret that can search for nearby targets on its own, with configurable targeting restrictions and behavior.
EA0A50DF468BCA8E55A4549821AC7874: A customizable turret that can search for nearby targets on its own, with configurable targeting restrictions and behavior.
21CD02F743E06B343EFB2A85B0780F8F: Set the instigator as the turret's target. The instigator must be a valid target within the turret's activation radius.
7BAD0A1F4B8288967F94BB8A5854EA06: Set the turret to the Wildlife & Creatures team.
9F9729F6440CDC271DF60B8EB869FE83: Set the turret to the same team as the instigator.
4813B51F438885E5697743BDF6F671B7: Triggers if the turret is enabled when someone enters the activation radius.
FEF818174870A37604F42984CAAC8F3F: Triggers when the turret finds a target.
668C14AC4278C53DF750E7BADDF59D89: Triggers when the turret is damaged.
4034BBAD4158BEB17E624892CBCC4D50: Triggers when the turret is destroyed.
9625176247FDA7A64DFD789F13CB8CE4: Triggers when the turret loses a target.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.ClearTarget.Des: Clears the current target, returning the Automated Turret to its normal targeting, If targeting is enabled, the device will likely just re-acquire its current target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.ActivationRadiu: Determines how close in meters someone can get to this device before it activates.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.IdleRotationAng: Determines how far the turret rotates while searching for a potential target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.DelayBeforeFiri: Determines how long in seconds the turret waits to begin firing after finding a target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.DisabledDuratio: Determines how long the turret is disabled after destruction. INFINITE - The turret must be re-enabled manually.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.TurretDamage.De: Determines how much damage the turret deals with each shot. ELIMINATION - The turretâ€™s shots will instantly eliminate the target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.DeviceHealth.De: Determines how much health this device has, or whether it's indestructible.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.IdleRotationMul: Determines how quickly the turret rotates while searching for a potential target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.TrackingRotatio: Determines how quickly the turret rotates while tracking a found target or looking for someone who damaged it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.RotationStyle.D: Determines how the turret rotates while searching for a potential target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.MaxTargetDistan: Determines the distance the turret can detect targets from while someone is within the activation radius. By default, this is slightly lower than Activation Radius. If disabled, the sentry will not automatically target and instead require manual targeting via the Set Target function.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.RateOfFire.Desc: Determines the length of time in seconds between each shot.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.WireDamageMulti: Determines the multiplier for damage dealt to the turret's wire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.PercentHealthRe: Determines what percentage of this device's max health is regained when it is re-enabled after destruction.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.DestructionBeha: Determines what the turret does when it gets destroyed. If set to EXPLODE, the explosion does not deal damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.WireAngle.Descr: Determines where the wire attaches to the turret's base.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bCanTargetAI.De: Determines whether the turret can target AI Guards, Wildlife, and Creatures.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bCanTargetCreat: Determines whether the turret can target Creatures.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bCanTargetGuard: Determines whether the turret can target Guards.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bCanTargetWildl: Determines whether the turret can target Wildlife.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bCanTargetPlaye: Determines whether the turret can target players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.AllowIdleRotati: Determines whether the turret rotates to search for potential targets.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bGoDormantIfAlo: Determines whether the turret will go back inside its base when there is nobody within the Activation Radius.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bStartEnabled.D: Determines whether this device is enabled when the game starts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.bShowWire.Descr: Determines whether to show a wire connected to the turret's base.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.StartingTeamTyp: Determines which team the turret is assigned to when the game begins, and swap between them using events. TEAM INDEX - Use the team from Default Team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.PossibleTargets: Determines which teams can be targeted, based on their relationship to the turret's team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.Disable.Descrip: Disables the turret, causing it to close and ignore its activation radius.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.Enable.Descript: Enables the turret to rotate, target, and track.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.UseTeamWildlife: If Possible Targets is not set to EVERYONE, set the turret to the Wildlife & Creatures team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.SetTurretTeam.D: If Possible Targets is not set to EVERYONE, set the turret to the same team as the instigator.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.UseDefaultTeamI: If Possible Targets is not set to EVERYONE, set the turret to the team from Default Team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.DefaultTeam.Des: If Starting Team Type is set to TEAM INDEX, determines which team the turret is assigned to when the game begins.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.SetTarget.Descr: Set the instigator as the turret's target. The instigator must be a valid target within the turret's activation radius.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.OnActivated.Des: Triggers when someone enters the activation radius while nobody else is there.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.OnFoundTarget.D: Triggers when the turret finds a target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.OnTurretDamaged: Triggers when the turret is damaged.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.OnTurretDestroy: Triggers when the turret is destroyed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.OnLostTarget.De: Triggers when the turret loses a target.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AutomatedTurret_C.EnableOnTargetS: Will enable the device when OnTarget gameplay function is called with a valid target.
